# vergeio_version (Data Source)
Retrieves the version of the system
# Example Usage
```
data "vergeio_version" "all" {
}
output "version" {
  value = data.vergeio_version.all
}
```
# Example Output
```
{
id      = "version"
name    = "v4"
version = "4.12.6"
}
```

## Attributes

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `name` (String)
- `version` (String)
